info.description: Valkyrie REST API Specs. This service uses sessions for authentication
info.title: Valkyrie API

get.summary: Get Members of the given Channel

parameters.description: Cursor Pagination using the createdAt field
parameters.name: cursor

confirmNewPassword.description: Must be the same as the newPassword value.

icon.description: The old guild icon url if no new image is selected. Set to null to reset the guild icon

type.description: The Http Response as a string

confirmNewPassword.description: Must be the same as the password value.

token.description: The token the user got from the email.

success.description: Only returns true, not a json object
